/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApApvLnGrpBDao.selectApApvLnGrpB */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
T.USER_UID, T.APV_LN_GRP_ID, T.APV_LN_GRP_NM, T.RESC_ID, T.SORT_ORDR, T.MODR_UID, DATE_FORMAT(T.MOD_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') MOD_DT, T.APV_LN_GRP_TYP_CD,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = IFNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM AP_APV_LN_GRP_B T
AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APV_LN_GRP_ID = #{apvLnGrpId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.APV_LN_GRP_TYP_CD = #{apvLnGrpTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.USER_UID, T.APV_LN_GRP_ID
LIMIT #{pageStrt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
